upgradeStep.summary: <form>Legacy project environments should be upgraded to the latest version of Liferay Workspace to ensure you leverage all available features.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Your Development Environment

upgradeStep.summary: <form>A Liferay Workspace is a generated environment that is built to hold and manage your Liferay projects. Create/import a workspace to get started.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Set Up Liferay Workspace

upgradeStep.summary: <form>If you don’t have an existing 7.x Liferay Workspace, you must create one. Skip to the next step if you have an existing workspace.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Create New Liferay Workspace

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Import an existing Liferay Workspace. If you don’t have one, revisit the previous step.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Import Existing Liferay Workspace

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Set the Liferay DXP version in workspace’s configuration you intend to upgrade to.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Configure Liferay Workspace Settings

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Configure your workspace by setting a product key.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Configure Workspace Product Key

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Download the Liferay DXP bundle you’re upgrading to.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Initialize Server Bundle

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Copy your Plugins SDK projects into workspace and convert them to Gradle/Maven projects.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Migrate Plugins SDK Projects

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Import your existing Plugins SDK projects.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Import Existing Plugins SDK Projects

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Migrate your existing plugins to workspace. This involves moving the plugin to workspace and converting it to the workspace’s build environment.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Migrate Existing Plugins to Workspace

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Optimize your workspace’s build environment for the most efficient code upgrade experience.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Build Dependencies

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Update your repository URL to Liferay’s frequently updated CDN repository.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Update Repository URL

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Update your Workspace plugin version to leverage the latest features of Liferay Workspace.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Update Workspace Plugin Version

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Remove the project’s dependency versions since it’s leveraging target platform.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Remove Dependency Versions

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Fix common upgrade problems dealing with your project’s dependencies and breaking changes.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Fix Upgrade Problems

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Auto-correct straightforward upgrade problems.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Auto-Correct Upgrade Problems

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Find upgrade problems. These are problems that cannot be auto-corrected; you can update them manually according to the breaking changes documentation.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Find Upgrade Problems

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Mark upgrade problems as resolved after addressing them.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Resolve Upgrade Problems

upgradeStep.summary: <form>After fixing your upgrade problems, remove the problem markers.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Remove Problem Markers

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Resolving a Project’s Dependencies</form>
upgradeStep.title: Resolving a Project’s Dependencies

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Resolving Breaking Changes</form>
upgradeStep.title: Resolving Breaking Changes

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade your Liferay Service Builder services.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Service Builder Services

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Remove legacy files that are no longer leveraged by Service Builder.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Remove Legacy Files

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Leverage OSGi Declarative Services in your Service Builder project.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Migrate from Spring DI to OSGi Declarative Services

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Rebuild your project’s services to persist your updates.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Rebuild Services

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade your customization plugins so they’re deployable to Liferay DXP 7.2.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Customization Plugins

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Customization Modules</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Customization Modules

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Core JSP Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Core JSP Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Portlet JSP Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Portlet JSP Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Service Wrapper Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Service Wrapper Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Core Language Key Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Core Language Key Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Portlet Language Key Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Portlet Language Key Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Model Listener Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Model Listener Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Event Action Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Event Action Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Servlet Filter Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Servlet Filter Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Portal Properties Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Portal Properties Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Struts Action Hooks</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Struts Action Hooks

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade your themes so they’re deployable to Liferay DXP 7.2.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Themes

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade 6.2 Themes to 7.2</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade 6.2 Themes to 7.2

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade 7.0 Themes to 7.2</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade 7.0 Themes to 7.2

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade 7.1 Themes to 7.2</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade 7.1 Themes to 7.2

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade your layout templates so they’re deployable to Liferay DXP 7.2.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Layout Templates

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Frameworks & Features</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Frameworks & Features

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Use Liferay DXP’s class loader to access the app server’s JNDI API.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade JNDI Data Source Usage

upgradeStep.summary: <form>For Service Builder logic remaining in a WAR, you must implement a service tracker to call services. For logic divided into OSGi modules, you can leverage Declarative Services.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Service Builder Service Invocation

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Adapt your app to account for Service Builder-specific changes.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Service Builder

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Velocity template usage is deprecated for Liferay DXP 7.2. You should convert your template to FreeMarker.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Migrate Off of Velocity Templates

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade your portlets so they’re deployable to Liferay DXP 7.2.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Generic Portlets</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Generic Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Liferay MVC Portlets</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Liferay MVC Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade JSF Portlets</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade JSF Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Servlet-based Portlets</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Servlet-based Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrading Spring Portlet MVC Portlets</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrading Spring Portlet MVC Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade Struts 1 Portlets</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Struts 1 Portlets

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Upgrade web plugins previously stored in the webs folder of your legacy Plugins SDK.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Web Plugins

upgradeStep.summary: <form>Attempt to leverage an extension point instead of upgrading your Ext plugin. If an Ext plugin is necessary, you must review all changes between the previous Liferay Portal instance you were using and Liferay DXP 7.2, and then manually modify your Ext plugin to merge your changes with Liferay DXP’s.</form>
upgradeStep.title: Upgrade Ext Plugins
